description: Everybody loves sweet and juicy barbecued prawns. These succulent seafood jewels are served with an easy mint and mango salad.
keywords: BBQ prawn,Pescatarian,Prawn,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,BBQ,Oct 2021,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Mango,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: BBQ Prawns With Mint & Mango Salsa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 Kensington Pride mango, peeled, finely chopped
1 bunch bunch mint, leaves picked, finely chopped (save extra 1/4 cup leaves to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine mango, onion, cucumber, mint and lime juice in a small bowl.

Preheat a barbecue grill or chargrill pan over high heat. Grill prawns and lime halves, cutsides down, for 4 minutes, turning prawns halfway, or until prawns are cooked through and lime is charred. Place prawns on a platter and scatter over extra mint. Serve with mango salsa and lime halves.
